name: Big Ball of Mud Anti-Pattern
description: A system lacking a perceivable architecture with expedient hacking predominating
when_to_use:
No clear architectural patterns
Haphazard code organization
Expedient solutions dominate
drawbacks:
No clear structure
Unpredictable behavior
Extremely hard to maintain
High technical debt
use_cases:
Legacy systems grown organically
Rapid prototypes turned production
Systems built under extreme time pressure
